---
name: Chore
about: Internal, non-feature development work such as CI/CD, configuration, repo maintenance,
  testing infrastructure, or cleanup tasks.
title: "[CHORE] "
labels: chore
assignees: ''

---

### Summary
Describe the internal task that needs to be completed.

### Why This Is Needed
Explain the purpose or context. Why does this task matter?  
(Examples: maintenance, cleanup, CI workflow, tooling, test harness, refactor prep)

### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Task is completed and meets the required objective
- [ ] No user-facing behavior changes unless specified
- [ ] Related documentation or config updated (if applicable)

### Additional Notes
(Optional) Add links, related issues, or any relevant background.
